theme.name: Professional Automotive
theme.aesthetic: Clean, modern, and professional with automotive industry appeal
theme.targetAudience: Vehicle owners seeking quality repair services, families, professionals, and fleet managers
theme.designPrinciples: Clear navigation, prominent service display, trust signals, easy contact access, and professional imagery
theme.gradientStyle: Subtle gradients from dark to light for depth and modern appeal

hero.description: Professional auto mechanic working under the hood of a car in a clean, modern garage

sections.description: Modern auto repair garage with organized tools and clean workspace
Team of professional mechanics in clean uniforms standing in front of garage

pages.name: Home
pages.layout: Hero section with services overview, about preview, testimonials, and contact CTA

pages.name: Services
pages.layout: Comprehensive list of automotive services with descriptions and pricing guides

pages.name: About
pages.layout: Company history, team introduction, certifications, and facility tour

pages.name: Contact
pages.layout: Contact form, location map, hours, phone numbers, and appointment booking

quoteForm.purpose: For customers requesting service quotes and appointments
quoteForm.submitAction: Email quote request to shop with customer details

contactForm.submitAction: Send message to shop management for follow-up

layouts.scrollEffects: Smooth parallax scrolling on hero and service sections with fade-in animations for content blocks
layouts.backgroundImageReveals: Hero background with mechanic working, services section with garage interior, about section with team photo
layouts.ctaContrast: High contrast red buttons on light backgrounds, white text on dark red for maximum visibility and action
